speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0156/2007 ) by Diana Wallis, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the public health consequences of the 1968 Thule crash (petition 720/2002) [ 2006/2012(INI) ].
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0156/2007 ) by Diana Wallis, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the public health consequences of the 1968 Thule crash (petition 720/2002) [ 2006/2012(INI) ].
agenda_item: Environmental protection from radiation following the crash of a military aircraft in Greenland (debate)
